vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ζύμ-η [ῡ], ἡ,
leaven, [LXX+4th c.BC+]; beer-yeast, [Refs 2nd c.AD+], etc.: metaphorically, of corruption, falsehood, NT.Matt.16.6, etc. (ζῡ-μᾱ or ζῡσ-μᾱ, cf. Sanskrit yauti 'mix', Sanskrit yūs, Latin jūs 'soup', Lett. jaut 'stir dough', javs 'dough'.)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
yeast, leaven
leaven, yeast, Mt. 16:12; 13:33; metaphorically leaven of the mind and conduct, by a system of doctrine or morals, used in a bad sense, Mt. 16:6, 11; 1Cor. 5:6
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (發麵用的) 酵
2) (對人的態度與行為有負面影響的) 酵
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (发面用的) 酵
2) (对人的态度与行为有负面影响的) 酵
